Troubleshooting for MySQL

Dec 10, 2018

1. Server SQL Modes

  • SELECT list is not in GROUP BY clause and contains nonaggregated column … incompatible with sql_mode=only_full_group_by

    查看全局sql_mode

    设置全局sql_mode

    仅仅设置全局，需要重新连接进来才会生效
